name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in utilizing **Python**, **Django**, and **Django REST Framework** to develop high-performance, scalable, and secure backend solutions. My technical expertise encompasses **Celery** for asynchronous task management, **PostgreSQL** for robust database solutions, and performance monitoring using tools such as **Sentry**, **Datadog**, and **Grafana**. I am well-versed in building efficient APIs adhering to **OpenAPI** standards while implementing **Kubernetes** for container orchestration and managing caching solutions for optimal performance. 
Furthermore, my complementary skills in **Elasticsearch** and **ClickHouse** empower me to handle large datasets and facilitate advanced querying capabilities. I bring a strong foundation in microservices architecture, CI/CD automation, and cloud technologies, ensuring the delivery of compliant applications aligned with industry standards. My passion also extends to profiling tools for performance tuning, enabling the integration of machine learning components when relevant.
